mods.name: Walls and Obstacles
mods.description: Adds walls, cover, and crates to the map (renders background - LOAD FIRST)

mods.name: HUD Layout Manager
mods.description: Core system for managing HUD element positioning (loads after background)

mods.name: Weapon Pickups
mods.description: Adds weapon pickups (SMG, Shotgun, Rifle) around the map

mods.name: Screen Shake
mods.description: Camera shake on hits, kills, and weapon fire

mods.name: Sound Effects
mods.description: Adds gunfire, hit, and death sound effects with distance-based volume

mods.name: Killstreak Announcer
mods.description: Announces killstreaks with big text (3, 5, 7, 10, 15 kills)

mods.name: Leaderboard Overlay
mods.description: Press TAB to show/hide top 5 players leaderboard

mods.name: Credits HUD
mods.description: Displays credits earned from kills - always enabled

mods.name: Mod Shop
mods.description: Press B to open the mod shop and purchase mods with credits

mods.name: Debug HUD
mods.description: Debug visualization for HUD Layout Manager

mods.name: Better HUD v2
mods.description: Enhanced HUD with FPS counter, ammo warnings, and speed indicator (10 credits in shop)

mods.name: Minimap v2
mods.description: Tactical minimap showing players and pickups (10 credits in shop)

mods.name: Kill Counter
mods.description: Shows your kill count in the top-left corner

mods.name: Rainbow Trail
mods.description: Adds a colorful particle trail behind your player (10 credits in shop)

mods.name: Damage Numbers
mods.description: Shows floating damage numbers when you hit enemies (10 credits in shop)
